constituent: religion, house, altar, show, two, small
koohiiStory1: I never really did figure out what religion my host family was - all I knew was that they kept an altar in their home.
koohiiStory2: All the RELIGIONS have their own temples, which are houses where they place their altars.
readingExamples: 宗教 (しゅうきょう), 宗派 (しゅうは), 改宗 (かいしゅう)
